name: Burgermon
description: Burgermon is a Food Digimon. It is a Digimon that took in the data of various hamburgers. It enjoys serving hamburgers that it puts all of its skill into making to hungry Digimon most of all. It aims to start a first-rate hamburger restaurant that will bring in a lot of customers with EbiBurgamon . It is merciless to those who disturb others while they are eating, and drives them away with its "Delicious Patty".  It is in a competitive relationship with Potamon over who is better when it comes to fast food.
